and exact counting in +-2^63. WARNING: do not use them as
replacement for 32bit int

trending.name: renv
trending.title: Project Environments
trending.description:
A dependency management toolkit for R. Using 'renv', you
can create and manage project-local R libraries, save the state
of these libraries to a 'lockfile', and later restore your
library as required.
